fields.title: Password Cracking Village
fields.description: In Password Cracking Village we have assembled exercises on different password cracking methods and tools: PDF password cracking, MD5 vulnerability, SSH passphrase cracking, brute forcing Basic Auth and HTTP password. You will run sets of commands until you can successfully crack a password.And a gentle reminder, Password123 is a very (very) bad password.
fields.summary: Are you up to the challenge to crack a password or will you pass? Prepare to immerse in a password cracking laboratory.

fields.title: Dark Web Village
fields.description: What happens in dark web stays in dark web? Spoiler alert, it doesn't. Dark web is a breeding ground for criminal activities: illicit drugs, credit card markets, forged documents... We invite you to take a look at the dark side, browse our catalogue of deep web sites safely without having to wait a ton to load the page.
fields.summary: Browse the dark web yourself using our systems that are set up to access the underground sites

fields.title: Asylum
fields.description: The Asylum Village challenges you to become a black hat hacker on a succession of tasks. Your mission, should you chose to accept it, is listed on a screen before you, the rest is up to you.
fields.summary: Learn the attacks that advanced security professionals use to breach corporate systems.
